ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The fifth meeting of the French Phage Network (Phages in Grenoble), was supported by IBS (Institute for Structural Biology, Grenoble), CNRS (INEE and INSB institutes) and INRA. IBS acknowledges integration into the Interdisciplinary Research Institute of Grenoble (IRIG, CEA). We thank all the authors that contributed to the meeting.
